title: Software meets hardware : bling a bot not a DIV
short_desc: In this session we will escape from our beloved browser and start moving things in the real world.
markdown: In this session we will escape from our beloved browser and start moving things in the real world. Use your hard earned Node skills to start planning your escape to the Internet of things. We'll start simple you'll be tasked to pimp a bot add some bling and beep. Then it's up to you and your team to complete a few challenges with your blinged up bot.
address: 4th Floor, Woodstock Industrial Centre, 66 Albert Road, Cape Town, za

title: Intro to PCI-DSS, its importance and how you can become compliant
short_desc: Peach Payments and Ian Petzer will be giving us a intro into integrating online Card Payments into your NodeJS app and discussing what the current landscape for PCI compliance in South-Africa looks like.
markdown: Peach Payments and Ian Petzer will be giving us a intro into integrating online Card Payments into your NodeJS app and discussing what the current landscape for PCI compliance in South-Africa looks like.
address: 4th Floor, Woodstock Industrial Centre, 66 Albert Road, Cape Town, za

title: Scaleconf 2014 NodeJS Workshop
short_desc: Intro to Node.js - a workshop by NodeCPT in collaboration with ScaleConf 2014 (scaleconf.org).
markdown:
Intro to Node.js - a workshop by NodeCPT in collaboration with ScaleConf 2014 (scaleconf.org).

Rudolf Meijering (qurio.co) and Barry Botha (io.co.za) will give a hands-on practical introduction to Node.js. You'll walk away with a deeper appreciation behind the hype around Node.js as well as having written some server-side javascript yourself.

The event is open to anyone, but you'll benefit the most if you come prepared with the following:
 - an eagerness to learn
 - a laptop with Node.js and the Git command line client installed

title: Building USSD & SMS Apps with Vumi and NodeJS
short_desc: With Africa and our limited connectivity, more and more consumers are only reachable via their mobile phones - a majority of those being feature phones.
markdown: With Africa and our limited connectivity, more and more consumers are only reachable via their mobile phones - a majority of those being feature phones. With this in mind, USSD and SMS are powerful channels to help ensure that everyone is able to use the great apps you create.
address: 4th Floor, Woodstock Industrial Centre, 66 Albert Road, Cape Town, za

title: Using Docker.io to provision cloud based services
short_desc: Simon Bishop will be presenting a use-case for Docker.io - for some idea about what this is about go to https://www.docker.io
markdown: Simon Bishop will be presenting a use-case for Docker.io - for some idea about what this is about go to https://www.docker.io
address: Longkloof Studios, Darters Road, Gardens, Cape Town, za

title: NodeJS and the Google Cloud Platform
short_desc: Google Cloud Platform enables developers to build, test and deploy applications on Google’s highly-scalable and reliable infrastructure.
markdown: Google Cloud Platform enables developers to build, test and deploy applications on Google’s highly-scalable and reliable infrastructure. Choose from computing, storage and application services for your web, mobile and backend solutions.

title: NodeZA
short_desc: Controllers contain the logical parts that work as a glue between views and models.
markdown: Controllers contain the logical parts that work as a glue between views and models. They accept a request and response object, load data from a model or collection, pass the data to a view template and then render the view.
